title: Lightforce RMDL240T 12V 100W 240 RMDL High Mount Driving Light - Twin Pack
features: The Lightforce 240 is our BEST VALUE
massive 9.5-inch (247mm) parabolic reflector and 100 watt Xenophot Bulb
description: The Lightforce 240 is our BEST VALUE. The lightweight 240 is our most powerful light, sporting a massive 9.5-inch (247mm) parabolic reflector and 100 watt Xenophot Bulb. This delivers performance unmatched by 130-watt competitors. No other light offers illumination of this magnitude with such functionality as a variable focus. The entire unit WEIGHS ONLY 16 OUNCES. Clearly, there is no competition for this massive off-road light. Sold in pairs. Wiring kit sold seperate.
